'''Christopher John Morriss MacLachlan''' is an author who has explored influences of [[Richard Wagner]]'s [[Der Ring des Nibelungen|Ring Cycle]] on [[Tolkien]]'s writing. He is a lecturer at the English department of the University of St. Andrews.

== Bibliography ==
=== Books ===
* [[2012]]: ''[[Tolkien and Wagner|Tolkien and Wagner: The Ring and ''Der Ring'']]''

== External links ==
* [http://www.st-andrews.ac.uk/english/people/academicstaff/maclachlan/ Christopher MacLachlan] at University of St. Andrews
